mdContact.rpOrgName: Department of Forestry, Fisheries and the Environment

idCitation.otherCitDet: The South Africa Conservation Areas Database is provided for download as a zip file containing shape files for major types of protected areas. The zip file also includes a definitions document, Conservation Areas Definition & SACAD Data Release Schedule 2022/23.

citRespParty.rpOrgName: Department of Forestry, Fisheries and the Environment

dataIdInfo.idPurp: To produce and maintain a comprehensive spatial database on the conservation estate in South Africa. SACAD is suitable for a wide range of planning, assessment, and analysis and display purposes. SACAD should not be used for legal or other specific government actions. Read the SACAD Data Disclaimer for more information.
dataIdInfo.idAbs:
The South African Conservation Areas Database (SACAD) contains spatial data for the conservation estate of South Africa. It includes spatial and attribute information for both formally protected areas and areas that have less formal protection. Data is collected by parcels which are aggregated to protected area level. Only outer boundaries are defined in this public release.

SACAD is updated on a continuous basis. It forms the basis for the Register of Protected Areas which is a legislative requirement under the National Environmental Management: Protected Areas Act, Act 57 of 2003.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Depratment of Forestry, Fisheries and the Environment, DFFE

Consts.useLimit: Please refer to the License Agreement. The user shall not sell or license the spatial data or digital maps. The Department of Forestry, Fisheries and the Environment cannot give any warranty on the accuracy of the map. The Department of Forestry, Fisheries and the Environment shall in no way be liable for results related to the use of these maps. Users of these digital maps must acknowledge the copyright for the digital map. Source: Department of Forestry, Fisheries and the Environment.

idPoC.rpOrgName: Department of Forestry, Fisheries and the Environment

mdMaint.maintNote: The database is continuously being updated. Annexure A: Quarter 2 Official Update provides a list of new or amendments for the period 04 June 2022 – 02 September 2022 per site category type. There were updates on the Ramsar Site Layer.

scpLvlDesc.attribSet: Good – some gaps may exist in the inventoried due to the availability of historical and provincial gazettes.
scpLvlDesc.datasetSet: Good – some gaps may exist in the inventoried due to the availability of historical and provincial gazettes.

dataLineage.statement: This SACAD Geodatabase is a product that is extracted from the Protected and Conserved Areas (PACA) geodatabase. The PACA SQL geodatabase is updated and maintained on a daily basis. SACAD extractions are done in the last week of each quarter.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: World Database on Protected Areas Identification. This field contains a unique identification number assigned by UNEP –WCMA.
Current Name: The is the current full legal name of the PA or CA from the declared gazette.
Differentiate if the site is a national or international protected area.
Major Category type namely Protected Areas (PA) or Conservation Area (CA).
Describes the type of protected area that a given area is designated as by the enabling legislation or convention.
The date that the area was first legally established as a PA or CA.
Indicates the current legal state of protection under law.
The total conservation area, in ha as calculated from the spatial data.
